name: VIT University
desc: VIT University, located in Vellore, Tamil Nadu, is renowned for its academic excellence and industry-oriented curriculum. With state-of-the-art infrastructure and vibrant campus life, it provides a conducive environment for holistic development.

name: Amrita University
desc: Amrita University, situated in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, is committed to providing quality education and fostering research excellence. With a focus on innovation and societal impact, it prepares students to excel in their chosen fields.

name: University of Pune
desc: University of Pune, located in Pune, Maharashtra, is a leading institution known for its academic heritage and diverse programs. With a legacy of innovation and excellence, it continues to inspire generations of learners.

name: Amity University
desc: Amity University, situated in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, is synonymous with academic excellence and holistic development. With a focus on innovation and entrepreneurship, it prepares students to thrive in a dynamic global environment.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
desc: IIT Kharagpur, one of India's premier engineering institutes, is renowned for its academic rigor and research excellence. With a legacy of innovation spanning decades, it continues to produce leaders and innovators in the field of technology.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi
desc: IIT Delhi, situated in New Delhi, is a beacon of academic excellence and technological innovation. With world-class faculty and state-of-the-art facilities, it offers a dynamic learning environment for aspiring engineers and technologists.

name: Indian Statistical Institute
desc: Indian Statistical Institute, located in Kolkata, West Bengal, is a premier institution known for its academic rigor and research contributions. With a focus on statistical sciences and allied disciplines, it continues to push the boundaries of knowledge.

name: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology
desc: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, situated in Patiala, Punjab, is a renowned institution known for its academic excellence and industry collaborations. With a legacy of innovation, it continues to produce skilled professionals and leaders.

name: Indian Institute of Science
desc: IISc Bangalore, nestled in the vibrant city of Bangalore, Karnataka, is a pioneer in scientific research and education. With world-class faculty and cutting-edge facilities, it remains at the forefront of innovation and knowledge creation.

name: Sri Ramaswamy Memorial University
desc: SRM University, located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, is a hub of academic excellence and innovation. With a diverse student community and modern infrastructure, it offers a conducive environment for holistic development and learning.
